title: eVo eSports LFM's Plat+
body:
Add me in game, Looking for Jungle, ADC and Mid lane. all must main roles.
Post app if you want.
Must have TeamSpeak3

IGN:
Rank:
AGE:
Role:
Champion Pool:
Competitive History:
Why we should choose you?

replies.body: No longer looking for members. Thanks and Congratulations to who made it in eVo eSports!!

IGN: Captain Gok
Rank: Plat 2
AGE: 19
Role: Jungle/Mid mains
Champion Pool: can play anyone at a decent level and jungle i can legitimately play anyone required tank cc or high dmg literally anything and mid  zed jayce yas syndra fizz liss kat anything really im very diverse in my champions
Competitive History: none 
Why we should choose you? im very friendly and not shy i will have a joke and enjoy a laugh but will be put my serious pants on when needed and play very seriously
Looking for some more jungle Trialers
Bump still looking for some more Trialers.

IGN: SG TrophyKills
Rank: Plat 5
AGE: 18
Role: Mid
Champion Pool: I have extensive knowledge with all midlines. And tones of hours logged on each one. Mastered everyone but unconventional picks like mid trist.
Competitive History: Played at OCE's first eb expo opens ladder, made it to semi finals on a team called Synergize Gaming. We got wrekt by immunity but was worth the experience. 
Why we should choose you? Because I know how to play, I like to play and I'm good to play with. <3

IGN: Fishey

Rank: Plat 4

AGE: 17

Role: All

Champion Pool: 
Supp - Thresh/Alister/Leona/Blitzcrank
Jungle - Diana/Lee Sin/Jarvan/Amumu/Cho'Gath/Rammus/Vi
Mid - Ahri/Katarina/Lux
ADC - Vayne/Cait
Top - Shen/Pantheon/Riven/Lee Sin/

Competitive History: was in a clan when on NA before OCE came out. and played in some fun tournies

Why we should choose you? due to the fact ive been gaming for a couple of years, i have been in many roles in a team, including the leader where i called shots and had to know the next play. i like to stick to schedural and i always try my best.

IGN: Esardo
Rank: plat 5
AGE: 16
Role: Mid/ADC
Champion Pool: I can play all mids/ads, i guess in terms of maining tho would be ori/ahri and adc would be vayne, draven (but i play fitting a team comp)
Competitive History: Played in 2 lans, and some online tournies
Why we should choose you? im really experienced in terms of ranked 5s, i know how to operate and i play the champs according to team comp/countering. all in all i know my stuff ^^

IGN: Bpopster17
AGE: 22
ROLE: MID/SUPP/JUNG
CHAMPION POOL: Mid - Xerath, Morg, Malz    Jungle - J4
Competitive History: Been in some small comps with some friends for fun but i am looking to do something more probably :-)
Why we should choose you? You should choose me because i have alot of free time, hard working keen to learn new things and follow orders well.

IGN: MAN BEAST
AGE: 18
Role: ADC
Champion Pool: Every ADC except for draven. Can learn if needed
Competitive History: Been in several teams, won a few small comps.
Why we should choose you? You should choose me because I am commited to become the best I can be. I am versatile and will always give it my 100%.
